Accidents, fires, accidents and criminality

TodayYesterday.Tomorrow.

Year
month
Day

Two people died in the fire in Orenbourg.

The tragic fires took place in the Akbulac and Orenburg regions.
20 January11:01Comments

In Orenburg, an angry man hit a hammer on the neighbor's head for making noise.

A 40-year-old head trauma patient was reported by the police.
20 January10:15Comments

Two residents Orenburg gave to fraudsters 2,800,000 roubles

It's a 70-year-old retiree and a 52-year-old man.
20 January08:25Comments

In Orenburg, two large shipments of grain were not allowed to enter Kazakhstan.

In the Russian-Kazakhstan State border of the Russian Federation, the Regional Office of the Russian-Kazakhsandszor prevents the illegal import into the neighbouring country of two batches of food. The total weight is over 45 tons.
19 January20:13Comments

In Orenburg, a man (18+) erupted from 15 floors on the Changal.

The victim died of injuries. According to the information available, death is not criminal.
19 January16:02Comments

In the Sakmar district, a house burned down because of a short circuit.

There was a report of fire in the village of Dmitrievka on the street of Priviral.
19 January14:29Comments

A member of the Ghai accident in which an Oki driver was killed was drunk (18+)

A 23-year-old young person was sentenced to 10 days of administrative arrest and a criminal case would be opened after which he would risk being deprived of his liberty for a long period.
19 January12:38Comments

In Orenburg, a migrant working as a courier of fraudsters was detained.

A man took half a million rubles from a 82-year-old resident of the regional center.
19 January12:13video videoComments

The crew of raiders attacked the inquisitioners in Orsca heard the verdict (18+)

Constantine Popov was sentenced to 19 years ' imprisonment, Natalia Kuznetsov to 7, and Nikolai Ivancin to one and a half years ' imprisonment.
19 January11:51video videoComments

In Orsk, a 11-year-old girl was hit by Geely.

The victim was hospitalized, clarified in the Orenburg State Inspectorate.
19 January10:17Comments

Driver from Orenburg province died in a crash in Bashkortstan (18+)

The man was 39. His Kia Rio ran into a Scania truck.
19 January09:41Comments

In Gaye, fire fighters rescued a man from the fourth floor of the burning house.

The fire staircase was used, and it was cleared at the Russian MHS in Orenburg.
19 January09:30Comments

Former SK investigator from Orenburg may be deprived of his liberty for 13 years.

This is the timeline for Sergei Chebanenko to request a public prosecutor, with a fine of 90 million roubles and a disqualification of special rank.
19 January08:00video videoComments

In the Quarken District, a man who burned a handicapped sister will go to the colony, but for a little while.

Toss my sister's brother, only when she screamed from pain prayed him to break the flame.
18 January19:58Comments

The Cameras of the Safe City do not rescue the Orangers from hooligans and criminals

The Orenburg police are not always able to identify malicious men who, under the Camera of the Safe City, commit illegal acts, well, although the fifth point of memory does not demonstrate to the " big brother " , the way to find the hooligans is then problematic.
18 January19:05video videoComments

Novotroitzka ' s occupants were removed by 6 million roubles

A spear man kept in two garages, apartments and two pavilions.
18 January11:36video videoComments

Reason: The killer from Orenburg received 9 years of colony (18+)

The Regional Prosecutor ' s Office reports this.
18 January09:16video videoComments

In Novotroitzka, a missing person was missing.

There's no news of Denise Ivanov since 13 January.
18 January08:59Comments

In Orsk, a man died in the fire (18+)

According to regional MES, he was 50 years old.
18 January08:55Comments

In Orenburg, an ex-police practitioner was convicted of fraud.

The city ' s Dzi district court pronounced the sentence in his criminal case.
18 January08:13Comments

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
